subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1752, how did it go?
description_text:
I still haven't got my order

On Fri, Jul 4, 2025, 5:53 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello juan, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi juan arbelaez,     Your tracking link shows that the package was delivered on the 7th. Please check your mailbox or ask your family if they have received any news. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEXH1902276944YQ

Package was deliver to wrong address...
Correct address is 209 Abigail ln greer sc 29651 ..
And that's what I had on my shipping address  from my receipt






On Wed, Jul 30, 2025, 6:24 AM service@simsonn.com

We apologize for the inconvenience. We have updated your address in our system, but our logistics system does not seem to have been updated yet. Is it still possible to receive your package at your previous address?

No unfortunately I won't be able to retrieve the package. I try getting in
contact with the apartment complex but they said they haven't received it
or seen it.

On Thu, Jul 31, 2025, 4:13 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi juan arbelaez,    We apologise for the inconvenience and will resend your order.

That's great, thank you very much.

On Sat, Aug 2, 2025, 6:33 AM service@simsonn.com
When will the order be ready to ship?
Hi juan arbelaez,    Here is your logistics tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEHJ0478673510YQ
